content: To save Xu Dog, you will need to head through the cave, just next to the Village Entrance Shrine in Sandgate Village in Yellow Wind Ridge.

To save Xu Dog, you will need to head through the cave, just next to the Village Entrance Shrine in Sandgate Village in Yellow Wind Ridge.
